text: Buddy Van Horn (August 20, 1928 – May 11, 2021) was an American stuntman and movie director. He was born in Los Angeles, California. He was known for directing many Clint Eastwood movies such as Any Which Way You Can (1980), The Dead Pool (1988), and Pink Cadillac (1989). Van Horn died on May 11, 2021 in Los Angeles at the age of 92.Buddy Van Horn, ‘Any Which Way You Can’ Director and Clint Eastwood’s Stunt Double, Dies at 92 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Stunt performers Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles
title: Buddy Van Horn
